stimulusHtml: By breaking from Japanese artistic traditions with his use of perspective and a low horizon line, Hokusai was responding to

features.html: Image © The Metropolitan Museum of Art / Image Source © Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: the influence of European art brought to Japan by Dutch traders
the influence of photographs due to their greater availability in Japan
an influx of Chinese paintings due to Japanese military expansion
a surge of religious conversions resulting from missionary activity
